reviewDetails.comment: She diligently works to find the best solution to health issues that arise from time to time.
Dr.Kimura always gives me the most appropriate treatment and timely access to my care.

The treatment of prescription from Dr. Kimura was sloppy.
She missed twice for three medicines and as result I had to buy additional medicine and costed $20 more than normal case.
She said sorry but very light touch, without any sincere apologize I felt.
She always tries to help you promptly when you need it.
Kindness support and appropriate guidance.

reviewDetails.comment: If you are seeing Dr. Gordon, ASK the office how much the appointment will be and what your insurance will cover because he charges an astronomically unreasonable amount of $660 just for an office visit. His Nurse Practitioner/Medical Assistant gave me an X-Ray before even seeing Dr. Gordon and I barely saw him for 5 minutes. Do not recommend.

I met with him on Nov. 4th for the first time - he was to set up 3 appointments for a special knee treatment and he. said it would be set up from the office.  I called two weeks afy=ter the Nov4 business to be told there was no information to confirm this.   They said they would correct it and get back to me.  They never did.  I called again to ask where I stand and was told they were trying to see if Cygna would pay for it.  I phoned yet againon Monday and was first tole that no request  to Cygna was made.  They called me back  right from Dr.Gordon`s office and  was told , after I told themi I would find another physician.  They said the request had been denied and that they were going to request again.    It is now December 13th and no response.    I do not blame Dr. Gordon, but rather the Mt. Sinai system.
Very professional and quickly solved my problem

His attention to details w/knowledge & patients
Was refreshen
So expensive. The wait was insanely long and honestly didn’t get much out of it
nice guy but always in a rush

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Kuwama is great, he takes his time to explain your symptoms and what treatment is required.
He is very humble, friendly and gives enough information to a patient with the language and concept which a patient can easily understand.
Appropriate analysis and medical guidance can be provided.
Knowledgeable and has good bedside manner.
Great personnel and very helpful
Over all it was pleasant visit. He was through and answered all the questions.
I had a great experience with Dr. Kuwama. He is very cheerful and a great listener.

reviewDetails.comment: Super nice, knowledgeable, caring, professional and he wastes no time but at the same time is friendly!

DR. PALATUCCI is a great doctor. He’s very loving, competent, efficient, knowledgeable and has great bedside manner.
Great Doctor!!!
God Bless,
[PERSONAL INFO]
It was the fist time in years I really felt myself visiting a Dr. and having a real examination and interest in my health and well being.
Palatucci has a great attitude and he made me feel at ease. Great doctor
Thorough. Great  guy -excellent bedside manner
Attentive, good communicator, and genuine

He is such a good doctor. Very kind, polite and professional. He truly cares about his patient and his team members. His medical assistant is very happy working with him. Such a nice team and good director of that site. Highly recommend.
clean office, nice staff - doctor was thorough and listened and explained all concerns

reviewDetails.comment: I was kept waiting 45 minutes past my appointment time. When the doctor did arrive, I felt very rushed. I explained why I was there and she kept on asking “Anything else?Anything else?” I felt like after waiting almost a hour I was being shoved out the door

Dr. Farber was very pleasant and knew her stuff. She explained things to me in regards to my concerns and I felt very confident with her explanation. I would definitely recommend her to family and friends
Dr. Farber was personable and worked with me to get a reasonably-priced prescription to take care of my issues.

Misdiagnosed my condition, although this was a virtual appointment. however if you cant diagnose properly over virtual calls, don’t offer them. Also did not make herself available for follow up like she said she would in first call.
Great doctor.  I would and I did reccomend Dr. Farber to my family and friends.  She is very knowledgebale, always ask questions and follow up with the problem.
Dr. Farber was very friendly and honest. She answered all of my questions and made me feel comfortable.
Listened well, answered all of my questions patiently, and was easy to schedule an appointment.
